messages.message: Invalid typeSize. The value must match the expected typeSize of the VkFormat.
messages.details: typeSize is 3 but for VkFormat VK_FORMAT_B10X6G10X6R10X6G10X6_422_UNORM_4PACK16 it must be 8.

messages.message: Non-conformant texture file accepted by libktx.
messages.details: KTX 2.0 file does not conform to the specification but it is currently accepted by libktx.
